I have been searching high and low for the perfect big sunglasses to give me the vintage vibes that I strive for.  I am normally hesitant to purchase sunglasses online because I am thick AF with a chubby face so “large” sunglasses often look smaller on me.  I am so glad I took the risk with these beauties!!  They fit perfectly, the little pearls on the ends of them look so cute and they give the perfect amber colored warmth to everything when you’re looking through them.  I never want to take them off and I will be purchasing more colors for sure! 😍 so if you’re a chubby chick looking for actual oversize sunglasses, these are for you!!
